channel.title: Lancaster Baptist Church Video Podcast
channel.description: Lancaster Baptist Podcast features the dynamic preaching and teaching of Dr. Paul Chappell, the senior Pastor of Lancaster Baptist Church and the President of West Coast Baptist College in Lancaster, CA. Pastor Chappell's preaching is powerful, challenging, and solidly Bible-based.
